transcripts.text: Dude, in the social media world, there is nothing hotter than going un-vegan right now.  The only pain in the ass is you gotta go vegan first.

Hey guys, I'm here having a delicious lunch with some of my favorite people.  You know JP, and that's Cal if you don't know him.  And we're getting ready to go for a really awesome hike.  It's gorgeous and sunny outside.
Yeah, I heard you started eating meat again.  I don't even care.  Yeah, I don't care.  I don't care that you started eating meat again.
I love animals.  And I have so much compassion for all of life that I want JP to die.
I just can't believe you would do this.
Just think about it.

That animal that you ate, did you even know its name?  I feel so betrayed by JP.  Him making a choice in his life affects me so much.  Now that he's not vegan anymore, I don't know what I'm gonna do.  I don't think JP has any right to not be vegan.

I know a lot of you in this vegan community have been following me for years.  You've looked up to me, and you've based your entire self-identity in how you and I both eat.  But this past week, a lot of hurtful things have been said about me online.  People commenting in, saying nasty things about me, calling into question, is JP still a vegan?  So many hurtful things have been said, and I want you to know it's true.  I'm not a vegan anymore.  This footage of me was leaked online and I wanted to share the truth with you because I got caught.  So I thought the time was right.  I'm sorry.  I'm sorry I didn't tell you sooner.  I want to ask for everyone's forgiveness and understanding for me at a time like this.  Having the vegan community attack me, criticize me, has brought so much attention to me and so much exposure that it's grown my following immensely.  I'm grateful for that.  But still, this has been so hard for me.  It's the hardest time of my life.  After six excruciatingly tasteless years as a vegan, I finally decided to start eating fish and eggs because I was developing health issues on a vegan diet.  I was anemic, had chronic fatigue, my thyroid wasn't functioning, my hormones were all off, I had digestive issues, candida, brain fog, and depression.  I mean, aside from all that, I was thriving on a vegan diet.  And all along, my doctor was recommending that I start eating fish and eggs.  Now, I'm an influencer, so I automatically think all doctors are idiots.  But still, after five painful years of living with these conditions, I decided to take her advice.  And it's true.  I started eating fish and eggs.  And I started hating myself.  I feel like even though I'm not a vegan anymore at heart, I still identify as a vegan.  Yes, I eat meat.  I still identify as a vegan.  I just want to be included.  I feel much better now.  I know a lot of you in this community feel betrayed by me, like you lost a leader, like you're a bunch of Christians and Jesus has said, like, hey guys, I'm going to be a Muslim now.  So I know this is hard on you.  Some of you have called me a hypocrite, accusing me of having been like a militant vegan.  Ugh, you murderous meat-eating son of a bitch!  I don't think I was ever really militant.  So from the bottom of my heart, I want you to know I'm sorry.  And I still sell my vegan diet plan because a lot of work went into creating six hours of content to basically just say, don't eat animals and eat plants.  So please check that out on my website.  And I just... I want to thank you all for paying so much more attention to me during this drama.
Look at his apology video!
He is such a hypocrite!
He's still selling vegan diet plans, and he's not even a vegan!
So you think you're a tough guy eating meat again?  Well, I have a friend who knows where your wife works out.
He was never a vegan!

Fuck!  Whole Foods on 6th and Lamar?  I bet you didn't know that.  I know you go shopping there every Saturday morning!  Bro, if I see you at Whole Foods putting a piece of meat on your plate, you're gonna have a FIST SANDWICH in your mouth!
It just hurts me that he's choosing something different than me.

He started eating animal products because he claims that his health was suffering from being on only a vegan diet.  Now, JP doesn't know shit about his own diet.  I do.  And it wasn't because he was on a vegan diet.
I'm telling you it wasn't because I don't want it to be!
Oh, digestion?  Try digesting my FIST!
I saw in a video once that JP has a cat made out of meat.
He was clinging to every finger this whole time!

I know that being angry doesn't serve me, nor does it serve the vegan movement.  I strongly believe that the vegan community is all about creating more unification and compassion in the world, and being angry only creates more disconnection and division.  What JP chooses to do with his life has nothing to do with mine.  To me, a part of being vegan is being compassionate for all beings, including humans, not just the people that agree with me.  So I wish JP the best.
